dict.INVALID_QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS: Ceci n'est pas un QR code{0}
dict.LOST_TRACKING_INSTRUCTIONS: 'Tracking' perdu. Déplacez l'appareil photo au code QR.
dict.SELFIE_IMAGE_SHARE_SUBJECT: Bonjour du Musée de l'aviation et de l'espace du Canada.
dict.SELFIE_IMAGE_SHARE_MESSAGE: Découvrez ce génial selfie de réalité augmentée du Musée de l'aviation et de l'espace du Canada.
dict.UNDETECTED_INSTRUCTIONS: Dirigez l'appareil photo à un code QR.
dict.MAIN_MENU_TUTORIAL_1: Welcome to the Ottawa Aviation and Space Museum Augmented Reality Experience!
dict.MAIN_MENU_TUTORIAL_2: Tap the Scan button below to get started
dict.MAIN_MENU_TUTORIAL_3:
Now that you've unlocked a model, you can take it home with you and view it at any time!

Tap on the Mementos button to view
dict.MAIN_MENU_TUTORIAL_4:
One last thing!
You can find settings for this app by clicking here
dict.QR_TUTORIAL_1: Around the museum you'll find QR Codes that look like this:
dict.QR_TUTORIAL_2: Find a QR code and scan it to begin!
dict.QR_TUTORIAL_3: You can rotate the model by swiping with your finger
dict.QR_TUTORIAL_4:
You can also view more info about this model
OR
take a selfie with the model
dict.SELFIE_TUTORIAL:
You can now take a slefie with the model!

To adjust the model:
• Pinch to zoom
• Tap and drag on model to move
• Swipe off model to rotate
dict.MEMENTOS_TUTORIAL: Here's a list of all the mementos you've unlocked! Tap on a model to scan and view anywhere on any flat surface!
dict.MARKERLESS_TUTORIAL: Take a photo of any flat surface (table, magazine cover, etc to view your model!
